subject: To all volunteers
author: Zobeir
content: Dear Volunteers, I wanted to take a moment to extend my deepest appreciation for all the incredible work you do as part of our organization. Your dedication and selflessness make a huge difference, and we are truly grateful for your efforts. Thank you for being amazing volunteers! Warm regards,

subject: To all volunteers
author: Sana Asaf
content: The most precious commodities today are time and attention.It is absolutely fantastic to know that you have been able to share these gems with strangers every Saturday or repeatedly throughout your week.It has filled me with hope and positivity for joining tech horizon. Thank you amazing trailblazersüå†

subject: To all volunteers
author: Bahare
content: I am incredibly grateful to the amazing volunteers who have helped me achieve my goal. Their kindness and support have made a world of a difference, and I feel truly fortunate to have had such friendly and caring individuals by my side.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Tony Arora
content: Words are not enough sometimes, and this is one of those instances. Thank you to all the volunteers in helping us grow, learn and appreciate this CYF community and give us the tools to get into Tech. THANK YOU!! It will soon be our time to give it forward and thank you for opening these doors for us.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Farnoosh Moayeri
content: As a trainee in this community, I am grateful for the opportunity to learn from you.Volunteering your time is not always easy, but you do it with such enthusiasm and passion that it is clear that you are truly committed to making a difference. Your patience, understanding, and willingness to help others learn and grow are truly inspiring and appreciated. Thank you again for all you do.

subject: To Abdi Mohamed, Fiona Meldrum, Andy Saffo
author: Farzaneh Haghani
content: Thank you all for your incredible support and knowledge sharing throughout my journey. I really appreciate all the time and effort you've invested into helping me grow as a developer. It's been my pleasure to learn from you, and I'm grateful to have you as my education or PD buddies.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èThank you once again for everything. Best regards

subject: To all volunteers
author: Marziyeh Azhdari
content: Your help and support in learning to code have been invaluable, and I appreciate everything you've done for me.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Anonymous
content: Thank you for your selfless support and guidance in my coding journey. Your dedication to helping others learn to code is truly admirable, and I am grateful for all the time and effort you've invested in me.

subject: To Gladwin
author: Andriana
content: I would like to thank Gladwin for all his help and patience in helping me understand a piece of work when I am completely stuck. He is very encouraging and also willing to help other trainees when asked. I have learnt a lot from him and he is definitely an asset wherever he goes.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Thank you is not enough to tell you all how much we appreciate you and every thing you gave done for us. Your constant dedication and passion in helping us will be forever remembered. May you find help in abundance when and wherever you may need it. THANK YOU. ‚ù§Ô∏è

subject: To all volunteers
author: Anonymous
content: In a world with war criminals like Putin and Khamenei, there are also people like you - who do everything to make our future even better than before. There are no words to describe how amazing people you are! Thank you from the bottom of my heart for being there for us! Sending you much love ‚ô•Ô∏è

subject: To Max
author: Anonymous
content: Thank you so much for all the help and support you have done for me. You are amazing Max.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Anonymous
content: Thank you so much for all the cyf volunteer.

subject: To Gladwin
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Dear Gladwin, THANK YOU SOOOO MUCH for being a SUPERstart TUTOR volunteer. Your dedication to me, my studies and thereby, my future, will forever be appreciated. Thank you!!

subject: To JAMES
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Thank you so much for all you did and continue to do for the #NinjaCoders! You are awesome.

subject: To ANDY SAFFO
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Dear Andy, Thank you for some of the most amazing PD sessions we ever had. You made coming to class early on a Saturday morning, bearable and fun. Thank you for uplifting us.

subject: To Martin
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Thank you for all your amazing help in class Martin. You are amazing.

subject: To ALEX
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Alex, your crazy laughs and your easy going silliness did more for us than you can ever know...#MentalDe-Stress or what!! Javascript maybe a shark, but you are the knight that helped us slay it! We love you!! Thank you...

subject: To Abdi
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Thank you Abdi, for your constant help and advice. You are the real MVP of DOM!

subject: To Iman
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Dear IMAN, we appreciate you and your quiet strength. Thank you for everything you do for us.

subject: Jemima
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Dear Jemima, thank you so much for all the wonderful and invaluable advice and help you gave us during and after PD sessions. You have made such a huge impact in developing our soft skills. We appreciate you. xx

subject: To Ellie Wintram
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Dear Ellie, you are such a huge part of London9 CYFers. You helped shaped our future with your selfless contributions and volunteering. MVF will forever be a part of our studies. Thank you for MVF, for DOM and for the endless amazing coffee at MVF. We adore you.

subject: To Clementine
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Thank you for all your contributions towards our studies Clem. And for AWS. You are a star!

subject: To Joey
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: Hey Joey...thank you for all your wonderful tutoring to L9. You are awesome. xx

subject: To Jason
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: To the Node Master!! Thank you Jason, for everything. You are amazing.

subject: To all HIBAQ
author: Gayle Ngozi
content: For your patience, your quiet smile and selfless attitude, thank you. You will always be an inspiration to me Hibaq.

subject: To Gladwin
author: Abdulmajid
content: Thank you for taking the time and helping when I needed the support and being patient with me.

subject: To Sam Pennington
author: Vitalina
content: I wanted to extend my heartfelt thanks for volunteering your time and expertise in the software developer course. Your commitment and willingness to help have made a significant impact on the learning journey of all the participants. Your dedication does not go unnoticed, and I'm incredibly grateful for your contribution.

subject: To Halden
author: Vitalina
content: Your contribution has been invaluable, and I truly appreciate your efforts in making the learning experience enjoyable for everyone. Thank you for being a rockstar!

subject: To Cornelia
author: Vitalina
content: I wanted to thank you for being my tech volunteer throughout this year. Your commitment, knowledge, and guidance have played a significant role in my development as a software developer. Your willingness to help, share insights, and motivate me has made a world of difference. I'm truly grateful to have had you as my mentor.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Vitalina
content: Your commitment, patience, and willingness to share your expertise have been instrumental in helping the participants grow and learn. Thank you for your invaluable contribution!

subject: To Pete Lindsell and Andy Saffo
author: Karleen
content: I'm very much grateful for the support given to me from my Tech and Professional Development Volunteers at Code Your Future, Pete Lindsell and Andy Saffo respectively. They are very motivating and positive individuals who always encouraged me to pursue a career in the tech industry. I have gained a wealth of technical skills and professional knowledge from them both, Thank you Andy and Pete.

subject: To all volunteers
author: Khadija
content: Thank you so much for giving up countless Saturdays to support us. I have learnt so much throughout these months both technical and professional knowledge. You are ALL my role models!

subject: To Moe
author: Khadija
content: Dear Moe, thank you so so so much for all your patience, kindness and time you have invested. I appreciate you so much, you have been an integral part of my journey. You are truly AMAZING!

subject: To Ben
author: Khadija
content: Thank you for all your support Ben! I appreciate your kindness, humour and all the great PD sessions.

subject: To Martin
author: Khadija
content: Not only have you been a great support on this journey but you have made me laugh countless times, THANK YOU!

subject: To James
author: Khadija
content: Dear James, Thank you so much for listening to me. You've been an immense help in my tech journey, I couldn't have done it without your support x

subject: To Abdi
author: Khadija
content: Mahadsanid for your time and support! You're amazingggg!
